column4: running skype (fresh install) and when I try to make a call, "problem with audio playback". someone on a forum said something about disabling other audio programs, but I don't see any others using audio in the processes list
make sure you have the latest version of skype, they just released  anew versio for linux
daftpunk: it took me less than 45min on a p3 with 256mb pc133 ram
